pci_app_update_app_scaling_description: Pick the deployment strategy that best suits your app. Choose a fixed size for the number of replicas your app will be deployed on, or specify a minimum and maximum number of replicas for your deployments. This will dynamically optimise performance, and adapt to the number of requests via the auto-scaling option.
pci_app_update_app_scaling_replicas: Number of replicas your app will be deployed on
pci_app_update_app_scaling_replicas_help: Deploy on a minimum of 2 replicas for high availability
pci_app_update_app_scaling_trigger_resou: The metric that will act as the trigger for auto-scaling
pci_app_update_app_scaling_price_warning: The total price of the deployment is calculated based on the minimum number of replicas selected. Please note that this cost may increase when auto-scaling is enabled.
pci_app_update_app_scaling_success: The scaling for your app has been updated.
pci_app_update_app_scaling_error: An error has occurred updating your {{appName}} app: {{message}}.
